metadata.synopsis: Player has rejected Emperor and doesn't have the means to free Orpheus, but knows that in order to defeat the Netherbrain they need to a) be illithid to wield the stones to their full effect, and b) assimilate Orpheus' power. If the player has the supreme tadpole, they can still assimilate Orpheus.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Endgame > Astral Plane > Play through Emperor's Assimilation dialogue (without possessing the Orphic Hammer), rejecting the Emperor's offers until he leaves. (or attack the Emperor)

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Looks like we're out of options...

2.speaker: Player
2.text: We still have the tadpole - we could become illithid and assimilate Orpheus.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: And as long as Orpheus is chained, he can't help us.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: We have the hammer - we can free Orpheus.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Wouldn't expect him to be very friendly after an aeon of captivity.
